name: tsbi1
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| wo(wo(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| wo(wo(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wb(w1, w2))

stmt.origin: pm2.61i(wo(wo(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wb(w1, w2)), wa(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wo(wo(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w1, w2), wo(wo(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wb(w1, w2)))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical biimplication, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
